Package ZuulBad

Provides the classes necessary to create the game 'ZuulBad'. Zuulbad is an adventure game for one player. The player can move from room to room in a castle and must do certain things to survive and win the game. There are e.g. classes and functions to make possible that the player can eat food, collect different items in a backpack, get hints from other creatures in rooms and beat monsters with weapons.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Katerina Matysova, Daniel Birk, Sarah Engelmayer
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Transportable
    This Interface represents the transportability of something.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Accessory
    This class is responsible for items of the game which the player cannot store or move.
    Environment
    This class initializes all objects in the game, such as rooms, items, characters.
    Food
    This class is responsible for food items in the game
    Game
    This class is the controller class for the graphical user interface and it connects the other classes of the game.
    Inventory
    This class handles the inventory of the player.
    Item
    This class is the superclass for all items of the game.
    Items
    This class is used to store items of the game in an arraylist as well as allowing interaction with that list
    NonPlayerCharacter
    This class creates a Non Player Character who can give messages when player enters a room and hints when player carries specific item
    Player
    This class creates the character which is controlled by the user.
    Valuable
    This class is responsible for valuable items in the game
    Weapon
    This class is responsible for weapon items in the game.
    WorldOfZuul
    This is the class which contains the main method for World of Zuul.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Level
    Enumeration for the levels of Difficulty.
